Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a healthy plant that has water and light.
The student can draw a plant that looks unhealthy because it has no water.
The student can show in their drawing that plants need water to live and grow.
The student can show in their drawing that plants need light to live and grow.
The student can identify and illustrate patterns that plants with enough water and light are living and growing.
The student can identify and illustrate patterns that plants without water and light do not live and grow.
